title: Cody Simpson helps nurse Miley Cyrus back to health as she tends to tonsillitis
text:
Things appear to be getting serious between Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson.

On Monday, the Wrecking Ball star, 26, revealed that her new boyfriend, 22, was looking after her as she recovers from tonsillitis.

Miley shared a photo to Instagram of Cody serenading her with a guitar by her bedside, accompanied by the caption: 'The DR. is back... luckiest'.

'The doctor is back': On Monday, Miley Cyrus thanked her boyfriend Cody Simpson (pictured) for looking after her while she has tonsillitis

Miley then appeared to make a joke about her ex-girlfriend Kaitlynn Carter, whom she briefly dated after her split with husband Liam Hemsworth earlier this year.

In the background of her photo of Cody was a Banksy-inspired artwork featuring a Star Wars stormtrooper, a banana and the text, 'Mom I'm gay'.

Seemingly in reference to this, she added the cheeky caption: 'Btw mom... there's been a change of plans'.

She's not happy! Earlier on Monday, Miley (pictured) complained about her recent bout of illness, telling her Instagram followers that 'tonsillitis is a f**king f**k'

In 2015, Miley came out as pansexual, which refers to when a person is attracted to others regardless of their of their sex or gender identity.

Earlier on Monday, Miley complained about her recent bout of illness, telling her Instagram followers that 'tonsillitis is a f**king f**k'.

Meanwhile, Australian singer Cody appears to be falling fast for his new girlfriend.

After the couple went public with their romance last week, the Pretty Brown Eyes hitmaker shared a gushing poem dedicated to Miley.

He's falling fast! It comes after Cody (left) shared a sexually-charged poem inspired by his new relationship earlier on Monday. Pictured with Miley over the weekend

Under the alias Prince Neptune, Cody wrote about 'spinning Elvis records and making love' in the early stages of a relationship.

Cody's complete poem read: 'The moon's souvenir, the boulevardier, a ballerina on the promenade.

'We open our curtains to the domesticated world for a natural hour, spinning Elvis records and making love in the soft jewelled morning.'

Cody first started sharing his musings as Prince Neptune in 2016, and will shortly be releasing his own book of poetry.

In 2018, he officially revealed himself as the creative mind behind the anonymous Instagram account, tweeting: 'I am Prince Neptune, poet.'

'In the soft jewelled morning': Under the alias Prince Neptune, Cody wrote about 'spinning Elvis records and making love' in the early stages of a relationship

Hidden talent: Cody first started sharing his musings as Prince Neptune in 2016, and he will shortly be releasing his own book of poetry

Cody's latest poem was widely praised by fans, with many interpreting it as a dedication to his new girlfriend.

'Dedicated to queen Miley,' one follower wrote, while another added: 'Miley inspiring some pretty good stuff! Love this couple.'

A third fan commented: 'Miley putting in your feels?'

'Miley inspiring some pretty good stuff!' Cody's latest poem was widely praised by fans, with many interpreting it as a dedication to his new girlfriend

New couple: Miley and Cody, who have been friends for several years, went public with their romance last week after they were spotted on a date in LA. Pictured in 2015

Things appear to be going well for Miley and Cody, with the heartthrob taking to Instagram on Sunday to serenade his new love.

Cody, who has had a crush on the former Disney star since he was 12, shared a video of himself cuddling up to Miley and singing to her as they watched a movie in bed.

He sung More Today Than Yesterday, which was made famous by American pop band Spiral Starecase in 1969.

'More than yesterday': Things appear to be going well for Miley and Cody, with the heartthrob taking to Instagram on Sunday to serenade his new love

Miley recently called off her relationship with Kaitlynn Carter, whom she briefly dated following her split with Liam Hemsworth after less than a year of marriage.

Last week, she blasted trolls on social media who were 'sl*t shaming' her for moving on with Cody so soon after her break-up with Kaitlynn.

'I refuse to [be a] recluse and "date" from home because a) that's not fun, b) [It's] extremely uncomfortable/puts me in a vulnerable position,' she wrote on Instagram.
description: Things appear to be getting serious between Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
